runs.comm: bowls one and gets some inward movement around leg stump, Virat was walking across his stumps, and the ball scooted off the pads behind square, Parnell was interested, no one else was
gets forward to a length ball going across him, and defends to cover
skiddy 139.6 kph delivery from Parnell, Vijay goes for the booming drive, and it zooms past the inside edge, again some movement for Wayne
this time he draws Vijay forward who pushes tentatively at one that doesn't get up much, and the edge flies between the keeper and the lone slip for a boundary
Parnell endeavours to angle it across Vijay again, but ends up pushing it very wide outside off
Vijay gets one in the area he likes, full on the pads, and whips it past square leg for another boundary, excellent timing
this time he pitches it a tad shorter, and it skids off the outside edge to third man as Vijay pushes at it from the crease
bowls one that comes in with the angle on a length, and Vijay squeezes it to point
no bounce on that one, it just skidded very low after pitching outside off on a length, Vijay was eyeing the straight boundary with the swing, but it went far under his blade
now he gets one on the slot, and picks the full delivery straight and high down the ground for a boundary, just stood there and gave it the golf swing
Ntini shortens the length, Vijay gets forward and pushes this one around off to cover
plays it out in front of mid on and they take the quick single even as the throw comes in and hits the non-striker's stumps
Kohli makes room to adjust for Ntini's angle and drives a full delivery to the left of cover for a single, there is a mix-up and Virat had to really hurry to make his ground
goes for the cut, the delivery is not short and wide enough, not much bounce as well, goes off the bottom half of the bat straight to a shortish point
creams this one off the middle alright, it goes to Amla at cover who lets it go through him
takes a step forward but the bat turns in his hand, and ball goes in to the on side

van Wyk has pulled off a blinder, Vijay had been eyeing the straight boundary, and got a full delivery too, but got too much underneath the ball as he went for the shot, the ball seemed to go and touch the stadium arch before coming down, and van Wyk went haring across from mid off to take it low, diving forward
Virat gets a shortish one on the pads, and tucks it away to fine leg for a boundary, stayed on the back foot and helped it along its way
looks to go for the big off drive, but cannot beat the off side cordon, didn't get the timing right on that one
starts with a length ball that angles in on leg stump, he misses out as he looks to play it through midwicket and is hit on the pads
this time he gets it off the middle of the bat, but straight to the man at midwicket
full and on the stumps is Rusty, Rohit gets an inside edge through square leg as he goes for the drive
goes for the slower one, Virat waits for it to arrive, and then lifts it over midwicket in that whiplash style of his, picked the length very early there
too straight from Rusty, turned behind square leg for a single
gets it to cut back in from outside off, Rohit wanted to cut too, but got an inside edge that went towards short fine, could have gone on to the stumps as well
bowls it full and wide outside off, he goes for the elegant drive on a knee, and gets a thick edge that runs down to third man for a boundary
wide delivery outside off again, he waits for it this time, and steers it to a squarish third man
Kohli goes for the pick-up shot over mid on, and gets it over the man there, it was full, there to be hit, and Virat made good contact

thwack! Ntini went outside off stump this time, and Virat was waiting for it, made some room outside leg and absolutely smashed this full delivery through extra cover for a boundary, the man there put in the dive but the ball had already passed him by then
this time Rohit gets on to the act, it was fullish but on the pads, and he lifted it over square leg all the way for six, that was absolute timing, and no power. Rohit holds the pose for effect
the 50 comes up in quick time with a tuck past midwicket off the back foot
gets forward and drives this length ball down to mid off
almost takes out Virat with this straight drive, it was in the air, and powerfully struck, and Kohli just about got out of the way
another misfield, this time at mid off, it was driven there, and van Wyk made a mess of it, letting the ball through his legs
full on the pads, flicked away to deep square leg
slower ball, hit down to mid on for a single
hit away to deep midwicket
stretches out to get to the pitch of this one outside off and pings long off with the drive
makes some room outside leg, and chips it in the air in the region of extra cover, there is no one there
driven to long off
the quicker one, he looks to rock back and cut it, but it hurries on to him
worked away behind square for a single, tidy over from Peterson
misses out on the cut as it turns in from outside off, hit back to the bowler
shot! it was bowled fuller from Johan, and Kohli waited for an instant to get the placement perfect, between long off and sweeper cover, and it sped to the boundary

goes for one shot too many, and gets bowled! it was shortish, and he went back to pull it, but it skidded on to him, and past the blade to crash into the stumps, this is a big wicket, Kohli was hitting them cleanly
and is off the mark with a push to long off
gets well forward and plays this tossed up delivery with the turn to long on
stretches forward and plays the perfect defensive push in to the off side
ho hum, worked away to deep midwicket for another single
lines up the big pull over midwicket, there is not much bounce here, and it scoots past midwicket along the ground
rocks back and pulls it to long on for a single
looks to slog sweep this full delivery, but does not get the timing, and the ball rolls away to deep midwicket
cut away to point for a single
Yuvi goes for the slog sweep again from outside off stump, and this time he connects nicely, midwicket leaps in the air in vain, and the ball is collected from the boundary
skips down the track to push a fuller one to Botha
beats him in the flight, Rohit was down the track again, saw the bal lwas not there for the big shot, and tries to run it past the keeper, got a thin edge that AB clanged, missed chance
pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
flatter and quicker, he seems to have got a thin inside edge after which the ball crashes into pad, and the umpire says no to Botha's appeal, it as going down leg too
gets forward and turns  it in the air to midwicket
driven to sweeper cover for a single
throws everything at this short delivery that skids on, but there is a man at deep midwicket
strays on the pads, he turns it late past short fine leg
Ntini with the diving save on the straight boundary, Rohit had thwacked it down the ground, but Makhaya saved the boundary, to loud cheers
goes down on a knee and looks to sweep from way outside off,and is beaten
driven down to Ntini on the long on boundary
looks to tap to extra cover and run, but only manages to complete the tap part
goes on the back foot and punches but straight to extra cover
goes for the slog sweep on one knee but the deep midwicket region is well protected
fired in flat and quick from round the stumps, and he just about manages to turn is fine on the leg side
this time Rohit gets the boundary, swinging the full ball to the left of the man at deep midwicket
goes off side this time, same result, backed away and played it inside out to the deep cover boundary
ends the over with a biggie, it was tossed up and he waited for it to arrive before slamming it high over deep midwicket for a six, brings up the 100 with the shot
punched down to long on off the back foot, brings Rohit on strike
South Africa have been sloppy today in the filed today, Rohit had pre-meditated the sweep shot, but it went to square leg, and right through him, and that's 50 for Rohit
driven to long off for a single
Yuvi doing the sensible thing, working this one past square leg to bring Rohit on strike

and Rohit finds Makhaya on the long on boundary, it was there to be hit in the slot, and he connected too, but the elevation was not much, and Ntini timed his leap perfectly on the boundary to take a fine high catch, the crowd love it
the ball rolls away off the pads on the leg side as Yuvi misses out on the glance
driven to midwicket off the front foot

what do we have here? Yuvraj is run out by a mile, it squirted off the pads fine down the leg side, and Yuvi wanted the single, almost ran up to Yusuf to tell him that he too needed to run, YK was having none of it, Yuvi abandoned all thoughts of the run belatedly, but the throw was already in at the non-striker's end, and Yuvraj was about half way down the pitch
driven towards long on for a single
gets off the mark with a push to long off
the good old tap and run into the covers, this time the run is completed without drama
Raina slog sweeps, but straight to the man at deep midwicket, he likes that shot a lot
hit on the pads as he pushed forward but it was going well down leg side
Raina stays in the crease, and plays the inside out lofted shot that just beats sweeper cover
goes for a big heave-ho through midwicket, and the inside edge rolls away to deep square leg
stays on the back foot and guides this ball angled in around off to third man
better length from Makhaya, full around middle, pushed away wide of extra cover for a single
swatted down to long on for a single, the ball is not coming on to the bat
full around off, he makes room and drives hard through extra cover, who runs hard to his right and dives to save a few runs
Rains swings and misses outside off, as the slow and low nature of this track comes through, the ball didn't get up at all
this time there is no missing, Raina loves the slog sweep, and connects nicely all the way to the deep midwicket boundary
the Suresh golf swing comes out, length ball on the stumps, and is despatched over deep midwicket for a six, as clean a swing as you will ever get
backs away outside leg, Rusty bowls it wider outside off, it rolls away off the bottom half of the bat to long off

the sloppiness continues for South Africa, this time its the captain, YK had squeezed out the full delivery to Botha's right at extra cover, he put in the dive, but you know what happened, it went through him
YK goes now, looked to heave this length ball, but got an inside edge that crashed into off stump, this track is not conducive for the horizontal shots
back of a length in to the body with that whippy action, tucked away past midwicket
on the pads to MS, who turns it to the left of short fine leg who dives and save the boundary
going across Dhoni who slaps it to extra cover off the front foot
makes some room outside leg to guide this length delivery to sweeper cover
Raina looks to swing this one through midwicket, but it was too full and too straight for the shot, and rolled away to midwicket along the ground
Dhoni goes back to a length delivery, and brings down the bat in time to punch it to extra cover, who throws at the non-striker's but misses
slower one around off, Dhoni picks it late and punches it to sweeper cover off the back foot
fuller and on the stumps, Raina backs away down the leg side, and drives it to mid off for a quick single
full again, Dhoni whips it down to long off in that inimitable fashion of his
gets it in the blockhole outside off, Raina misses out with the glide
connects this time with his slog sweep, it was not full enough and he went through with the shot, and the result is six over deep midwicket, 150 up for India
almost yorker length, Raina doesn't go hard at it, and pushes it calmly straight down the ground past the non-striker's stumps
Dhoni swivels and pulls, but does not get any timing on the shot, the ball scoots away through midwicket
length ball, absolutely smoked, but straight to extra cover who is right on the edge of the circle
good ball, right in the blockhole, squeezed out towards point by Raina
swung down along the ground to long on, MS is looking to launch in to that whiplash pick-up shot of his
full but Raina cannot get it away, had backed away too far down the leg side, and gets an outside edge towards point
again MS lines up the straight whip shot, but it rolls away back to the bowler, went very hard at the ball
sprays the first one wide outside off even as Raina went backing away outside leg
another full and wide delivery, he stretches out to slap it to extra cover
finally MS gets one full and swings it down the ground, but long on runs across and cuts it off
poor delivery, and rightly despatched, it was a high full toss wide outside off, and Raina launched hard into it, and it sailed over extra cover for six
goes for the shot again, it is another full toss, but this time he gets a thick edge down to third man
right in the blockhole on off, not much MS can do except squeeze it out to extra cover
Suresh falls off the last ball, it was full and he launched into the big swing over midwicket, but the outside edge swirled high in the air over mid off, who made no mistake with the catch
